website_summaries.verdict: Modern model available in 3 colors. At 14 inches, it’s larger than the average overhead DVD player.
pros: Newer model with improved sound quality for headsets, external speakers, and FM radio settings
Resolution is crisp and clear, and at 14 inches, the screen is easy to see
cons: Installation guide is not user-friendly, and customer service may be difficult to contact for assistance

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are excellent
customer_reviews.text: The screen is sharp and the install was simple. The unit has 1 set of AV inputs and 1 set of AV outputs. Also has full-size HDMI and USB port. I have connected my a Roku Streaming Stick+ to the HDMI input and powered it via the USB port. Then connected the Roku to my phone hotspot and my kids streamed Disney+ in the car for a 45 min test drive. Everything worked great with screen and audio via 5 sets of IR headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality customer service with quality products...
customer_reviews.text: Works great a nice clear picture my son loves it. He lives going for rides and it’s really cool with cars sound system . Great company also, had an issue with a purchase a while back and they made good on it a complete refund with no questions asked. I would by again highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Verify and identify mounting location before starting process
customer_reviews.text: With just basic car audio knowledge this was a very easy install. After identifying where to mount and using basic tools it was a very easy install. Has been installed for approximately 2 weeks and works exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cothron

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Had it professionally installed and didn't work straight out of the box. Return process was easy though.
customer_reviews.author: Davi

customer_reviews.title: Could use better instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: Good product but install and operation procedures in the manual are limited at best. You really need to be good at auto repair to install
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed TVs for over 10yrs I’d have to say this is one of the easier units to install. Absolutely love the color options
customer_reviews.author: Jamescobb

customer_reviews.title: Good TV Quality
customer_reviews.text: The best car TV highly recommended easy to install thanks
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Everything was just as it is , perfect size for a good price . Good quality. Even came 3 days before it was suppose to be delivered
customer_reviews.author: Junaris

customer_reviews.title: Rockville tv
customer_reviews.text: First tv that cane wasn’t functioning properly, contacted customer service, ordered another one, and this one works well. Love the size of the screen
customer_reviews.author: Uncorn Flute Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have no complaints this monitor fulfilled all my expectations. You have a Rockville faithful from here on out!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jesse lopez

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and the oicture quality is awesome
customer_reviews.author: SPRING M STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Measure to make sure you have room for it. Very big in size.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice product. Easy to install and works great. Was installed in a 08 Saturn outlook.
customer_reviews.author: William dylina

customer_reviews.title: Do your research before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an easy, at home install. Customer service was impossible to reach.
customer_reviews.author: alan armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit and installs easily (once you figure out your existing wiring). We installed it in a boat so we did not use the camera feature. One feature that was impressive was the 3 different color covers for the unit ... it’s nice to have options and to be able to have a color that complements your installation. Very happy with the unit so far ...
customer_reviews.author: doodlebug

customer_reviews.title: working great for us.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our 2005 Sequoia DVD player. Night and day difference. Headphones work great. For the money, and excellent value. Installation was a breeze. Shape was different that the old unit, so I cut a piece of 7/16 plywood and glued vinyl to it to make a mounting plate. Looks great in the SUV, my little girl is really enjoying movies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: papayamon

customer_reviews.title: Large, Clear and crisp picture.
customer_reviews.text: The kids just love it. It has a beautiful large screen that is clear and crisp. The headphones are a plus but am unable to get either of them to work with it. It has only one audio jack and unable to get it to dork with my audio headphone splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Dahlin

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: When this DVD player worked it was decent , but less than a year after installation it will not read any discs!! Don’t waste your money on this DVD player!
customer_reviews.author: Rye R

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product the headphones that came with this will not connect wirelessly. Seems pointless to have headphones that won't connect. The sound quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: Screen failure
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked fine for 2-3 months but then lines started appearing across the screen and then would disappear. This continued for about 8 months until the screen was completely black & no picture would come through. It was not installation related after checking connections again. The rubber gasket around the screen also has worked it’s way out and cannot be repaired without damaging the screen from the exterior.
customer_reviews.author: J Stafford

product_meta.title: Rockville RVD14BGB Black/Grey/Tan 14" Flip Down DVD Monitor w/ Games and Headphones
feature_bullets: Package Includes : Rockville RVD14BGB Black/Grey/Tan 14" Flip Down Car Monitor with DVD, HDMI, Games, and USB + (2) Rockville RFH3 Dual Channel Wireless Ir Headphones With Auto-Turn-Off And Volume Control And On/Off Switch

Rockville RVD14BGB Black/Grey/Tan 14" Flip Down Car Monitor w DVD/HDMI/Games/USB. 1080P resolution – higest resolution on the market! (1920 x 1080). Includes 3 interchangeable color skins (Black, grey, and beige). Slot-loading DVD player with anti-skip mechanism. HDMI Input. USB 2.0 input can play back songs stored on a thumb drive (up to 16gb). SD Card slot to play media stored on an SD card (up to 16gb). 2 A/V Inputs + 1A/V Output .

Comes with 300 (32 bit) games and multi function game controller. 2 super bright LED dome lights that can go on and off automatically when you open your door. Dual channel IR transmitter for wireless headphone connection. Built in speakers. Built-in wireless FM Transmitter with selectable station 87.7-107.9 Mhz. Multi-language OSD (On-Screen Display). Compatible Media Types: . Audio:MP3,MP4,WMA,WAV .

Video: MPEG4,AVI,WMV,VOB,Divx, MPEG. PHOTOS:JPG  . BOOKS:TXT. Compatible Discs: DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD-9, CD, CD-R, CD-RW, VCD, MP3, MP4 . LCD panel brand: Innolux/CHIMEI (one of the top brands in the world for LCD panels). Backlight: LED. Adjustable picture settings (Brightness, contrast, color, etc). Multi system: NTSC/PAL auto switching. 16:9 (Wide Screen) . Slim and compact design for a less noticeable installation.

Rockville RFH-3 Dual Channel IR Headphones . Foldable design for Travel convenience and easy storage. Comfort control leatherette ear surround. Dual channel function capable (A/B). Improved acoustic performance. 40mm Mylar dome speaker built in. Extended bass response. Impedance: 32 Ohms ±10%. Effective distance: 10 meters (max.). Light weight design for wearing comfort. Auto muting on headphone. Auto power off when no signal.
